sentences.sentence: You may clomp chirm and strands of sunrise until you die.
sentences.translation: 而你只能循着鸟鸣声，踏着日出地平线，撰写着孑然不回头。

sentences.sentence: How to spell: shoes, pants, shirt, gloves, hat, pumpkin head, clomp, wiggle, shake, clap, nod, boo .
sentences.translation: 单字拼法：鞋子，裤子，衬衫，手套，帽子，南瓜头，重重地走，蠕动，摇。
